sentences.sentence: Many leading scientists do not consider that science can give absolutely reliable knowledge.
sentences.translation: 许多杰出科学家都不认为科学能够提供绝对可靠的知识。

sentences.translation: 邮局里的人员将信件按寄送地点分类。

sentences.translation: 他在书店偶然发现了一些笑话集。

sentences.translation: 你在当地的任一所书店都能找到此类书。

sentences.sentence: The technology bookstore: Browse for books on these and other technical topics.
sentences.translation: 技术书店：浏览关于这些主题和其他技术主题的图书。

sentences.translation: 此片正在当地影院上映。

sentences.sentence: Ricky turned and walked away.
sentences.translation: 里基转身走了。

sentences.sentence: She turned her head in surprise.
sentences.translation: 她惊讶地转过头来。

sentences.sentence: Brigitte glared at him, turned on her heel (= turned away suddenly because of anger ) , and stomped out of the room.
sentences.translation: 布丽吉特瞪了他一眼，猛地一转身，噔噔噔地走出了房间。

sentences.sentence: She held out her left hand.
sentences.translation: 她伸出左手。

sentences.sentence: a scar on the left side of his face
sentences.translation: 他左脸上的伤疤

sentences.sentence: He vainly hope to travel round the world on foot.
sentences.translation: 他梦想步行周游世界。

sentences.sentence: I missed the regular bus, so I had to go to work on foot.
sentences.translation: 早上没赶上班车，没奈何只好步行去上班。

sentences.sentence: He continues up the mountain on foot, in the snow and sleet, and he's getting sick from the cold.
sentences.translation: 在冰雨的天气里，他继续步行朝着山上前进，因为天气寒冷，他开始变得不舒服了。

sentences.sentence: The price of oil fell by a further $2 a barrel.
sentences.translation: 每桶油价又下跌了两美元。

sentences.sentence: I was overcharged by £3.
sentences.translation: 我被多收了3英镑。

sentences.sentence: Godard’s first film was better by far (=  by a large amount or degree  ) .
sentences.translation: 戈达尔的第一部电影要好得多。

sentences.sentence: Buses run at 15 and 30 minutes past the hour.
sentences.translation: 公共汽车在每小时的15分和30分时发车。

sentences.translation: 这是一家大航空公司，拥有庞大的机群。

sentences.sentence: It’s much quicker to go by plane .
sentences.translation: 乘飞机去会快很多。

sentences.sentence: She slept on the plane .
sentences.translation: 她在飞机上睡着了。

sentences.translation: 拥挤的地铁站

sentences.sentence: Boston has the oldest subway system in the US.

sentences.sentence: We went all the way to Inverness by train.

sentences.translation: 汽车正以非常慢的速度行驶。

sentences.sentence: a slow walker
sentences.translation: 慢慢走着的人

sentences.sentence: The economy faces a year of slower growth.
sentences.translation: 经济将面临增长更缓慢的一年。

sentences.sentence: Take a few deep, slow breaths.
sentences.translation: 慢慢地深吸几口气。

sentences.sentence: Keep your speed down.
sentences.translation: 速度放慢。

sentences.sentence: House prices have come down in recent months.
sentences.translation: 最近几个月房价降下来了。

sentences.sentence: Turn the radio down.
sentences.translation: 把收音机的音量调低。

sentences.sentence: You will need to slow down for a while.
sentences.translation: 你将会需要放松一会儿。

停止时间；减速时间；制动时间

sentences.sentence: He stopped suddenly when he saw Ruth.
sentences.translation: 他一看到露丝，便突然停住了。

sentences.sentence: Stop! Come back!
sentences.translation: 停下，回来！

sentences.sentence: He stopped the car and got out.
sentences.translation: 他把车停住并下了车。

sentences.sentence: I was worried that the security guards would stop us at the gate.
sentences.translation: 我担心警卫会把我们挡在门口。

sentences.sentence: It is said that Mrs White rules her husband strictly.
sentences.translation: 据说怀特夫人对她的丈夫管得很严。

sentences.sentence: He hitched his chair to me and told the secrets about Mrs Johnson.
sentences.translation: 他把椅子向我身边挪了挪，然后把约翰逊夫人的秘密告诉了我。

phrases.translation: 在早期；从事，经营；继续下去
预警系统；预先警报系统

sentences.sentence: the early morning sunshine
sentences.translation: 清晨的阳光

sentences.sentence: an afternoon in early spring
sentences.translation: 一个早春的午后

sentences.sentence: In the early days, the railways mainly carried goods.
sentences.translation: 最初，铁路主要用于运输货物。

sentences.sentence: She is in her early twenties.
sentences.translation: 她20岁出头。

sentences.sentence: the recession of the early 1980s
sentences.translation: 20世纪80年代初的经济衰退

sentences.sentence: The money could be paid as early as next week.
sentences.translation: 钱款最早可以在下周支付。

sentences.sentence: He spent the early part of his career at St John’s Hospital.
sentences.translation: 他在圣约翰医院度过了他的早期职业生涯。

sentences.sentence: the experiences of early childhood
sentences.translation: 幼年的经历

sentences.sentence: the early works of Shakespeare
sentences.translation: 莎士比亚的早期作品

sentences.sentence: My earliest memories are of fruit trees.
sentences.translation: 我最早的记忆和果树有关。

sentences.sentence: Early signs are encouraging.
sentences.translation: 早期的征兆鼓舞人心。

phrases.translation: 安全帽；（飞行员，摩托车驾驶员等的）防撞头盔

sentences.sentence: The Sword split the Knight's helmet and bit him fatally.
sentences.translation: 剑劈开了骑士的头盔并致命地刺进他。

sentences.sentence: Instead, he was told the last time that she loved him, got a hug from her, put his helmet on her so that she can live, and die himself...
sentences.translation: 相反，他叫女孩最后一次说她爱他，最后一次拥抱他，并让她戴上自己的头盔，因而，女孩可以幸免于难，而他自己却离开了人世……

sentences.sentence: What you definitely need: helmet, appropriate clothing, phone, passport (with visas), water and snacks.
sentences.translation: 必需品：头盔，适量的衣物，电话，护照和签证，水和点心。

phrases.translation: 一定（对过去事实肯定的推测）
必定做了…（表示对过去的推测）

sentences.sentence: All passengers must wear seat belts.
sentences.translation: 所有乘客都必须系安全带。

sentences.sentence: It’s getting late. I really must go.
sentences.translation: 天晚了，我真的必须走了。

sentences.sentence: You must work hard.
sentences.translation: 你必须努力工作。

sentences.sentence: We must all be patient.
sentences.translation: 我们都必须耐心。

sentences.sentence: Must I pay now?
sentences.translation: 我必须现在付款吗？

sentences.sentence: For the engine to work, the green lever must be in the ‘up’ position.
sentences.translation: 要启动引擎，绿色操纵杆必须在“上”这一挡。

sentences.sentence: Accidents must be reported to the safety officer.
sentences.translation: 出了事故必须向安全员报告。

phrases.translation: 磨损，耗尽；穿破；使精疲力竭
磨损试验；磨耗试验；试穿

sentences.sentence: Susanna was wearing a black silk dress.
sentences.translation: 苏珊娜穿着一条黑色真丝连衣裙。

sentences.sentence: He wore glasses for reading.
sentences.translation: 他阅读时戴眼镜。

phrases.translation: 注意广度；注意力的持续时间
过动症，注意力不足过动症；过度活跃症

sentences.sentence: My attention wasn’t really on the game.
sentences.translation: 我的注意力其实不在比赛上。

sentences.sentence: She tried to pay attention to what he was saying.
sentences.translation: 她尽量注意听他说话。

sentences.sentence: If you paid more attention in class, you might actually learn something!
sentences.translation: 要是你上课更认真些，也许能实实在在地学到些东西！

sentences.sentence: Scott sat down at his desk and turned his attention to the file he had in front of him.
sentences.translation: 斯科特在自己的办公桌前坐下，将注意力转向面前的文件。

sentences.sentence: As a society we need to give more attention to the needs of older people.
sentences.translation: 生活在同一社会里，我们得更加关注长者的需求。

sentences.sentence: Now he’s gone, I can give you my undivided attention .
sentences.translation: 现在他已经走了，我可以把全部注意力都放在你身上。

sentences.sentence: This game is fun and is sure to keep the attention of any young student.
sentences.translation: 这个游戏很有趣，一定能使年幼学生保持注意力。

sentences.sentence: They listened to the speech with close attention .
sentences.translation: 他们很认真地听演讲。

sentences.sentence: Attention to detail is essential in this job.
sentences.translation: 关注细节是这份工作所必需的。

sentences.sentence: During the lecture Sarah’s attention began to wander .
sentences.translation: 上课时，萨拉开始走神了。

sentences.sentence: In this materialistic age we do not have time to pay attention to our surroundings.
sentences.translation: 在这唯物主义的时代里，我们没有时间去注意我们周围的世界。

sentences.sentence: In economic work, we should pay attention to opening up the source and regulating the flow from time to time.
sentences.translation: 在经济工作中， 应该经常注意开源节流。

sentences.sentence: We should pay attention to this from the very beginning.
sentences.translation: 我们从一开始就要注意这个问题。

phrases.translation: 空中交通，航空运输；飞航
交通状况，运输情况；有效状况
客运，旅客流量；旅客运输

sentences.sentence: There wasn’t much traffic on the roads.
sentences.translation: 路上车辆不多。

sentences.sentence: The sound of the traffic kept me awake.
sentences.translation: 车辆来往的嘈杂声令我无法入睡。

sentences.sentence: It's so much safer to get across the road at the traffic lights.
sentences.translation: 在有交通红绿灯的地方横穿马路要安全得多。

phrases.translation: 拜仁慕尼黑（德国足球队）

sentences.sentence: And then we went to Munich.
sentences.translation: 然后我们去了慕尼黑。

sentences.sentence: She urgently phones her contact, and he orders her to go to Munich and remain untraceable.
sentences.translation: 她急切地打电话给她的联络人，对方指令她前往慕尼黑，并保持不被他人找到。

phrases.translation: 西德（原德意志联邦共和国的简称）

sentences.sentence: Germany borders on France.
sentences.translation: 德国与法国接壤。

sentences.sentence: The news aroused much fear in Germany.
sentences.translation: 这消息在德国引起很大恐慌。

sentences.sentence: The new Nazism is resurging in some places in Germany.
sentences.translation: 新纳粹主义正在德国的一些地方复活。

phrases.translation: 阿拉斯加山脉（美国阿拉斯加州南部山脉）

sentences.sentence: Like I said, perfect, if you live in Alaska.
sentences.translation: 像我说过的，完美，如果你住在阿拉斯加的话。

sentences.sentence: Alaska and Hawaii were dependencies of the United States.
sentences.translation: 阿拉斯加和夏威夷过去是美国的属地。

sentences.sentence: Once they went camping with friends who had moved to Alaska.
sentences.translation: 有一次，他们和几个搬到阿拉斯加的朋友去野营。

phrases.translation: 雪橇犬；雪橇狗；拉雪橇的狗

sentences.sentence: She tumbled over a sled.
sentences.translation: 她被雪橇绊了一跤。

sentences.sentence: When his sled broke down, he repaired it.
sentences.translation: 当他的雪橇坏掉时，他自己维修。

sentences.sentence: The hut stands at the foot of a near vertical wall of rock in an icy fjord in the high Arctic, a week away by dog sled from the nearest human settlement.
sentences.translation: 小屋坐落在高纬度北极地区峡湾边一座几乎是垂直的山岩下，从最近的有人居住的地方到此地，狗拉的雪橇要走一个星期。

phrases.translation: 夏令时间；日光节约时间（daylight-saving time）

sentences.sentence: Slow down – you’re driving too fast.
sentences.translation: 慢点——你开得太快了。

sentences.sentence: a fast-moving river
sentences.translation: 湍急的河流

sentences.sentence: Johnny ran off as fast as his legs could carry him (= running as quickly as he could ) .
sentences.translation: 约翰尼飞也似的跑开了。

phrases.translation: 渡轮码头；车船联运港；客轮码头

sentences.sentence: I left my bag of film on the  ferry.
sentences.translation: 我把装底片的旅行袋遗放在渡船上.

sentences.sentence: The ferry service of bygone days has been replaced by that tunnel.
sentences.translation: 往日的渡口已被那个隧道取代。

sentences.sentence: It is windy today,so it would be difficult to put the ferry boat across.
sentences.translation: 今天刮风，要摆渡到对岸不容易。

sentences.sentence: Papa Westray has a population of just 70 and no secondary school.
sentences.translation: 帕帕韦斯特雷岛人口只有70，岛上没有中学。

phrases.translation: n. 苏格兰场（伦敦警察厅）
（苏格兰正式定为国教的）苏格兰长老会

sentences.sentence: He traveled Scotland last year.
sentences.translation: 他去年在苏格兰旅行。

sentences.sentence: England, Scotland and Wales compose the island of Great Britain.
sentences.translation: 英格兰、苏格兰和威尔士组成大不列颠岛国。

sentences.sentence: Why should they not go on to Scotland, if that had been the case?
sentences.translation: 要是真象你所想的那样，那他们干吗不到苏格兰去呢？

phrases.translation: 国事访问（国家元首至其他国的官式访问）

sentences.sentence: Eric went to Seattle to visit his cousins.
sentences.translation: 埃里克到西雅图去看望他的表兄弟。

sentences.sentence: I was really pleased that they came to visit me.
sentences.translation: 他们来看我，我真是高兴。

sentences.sentence: Which cities did you visit in Spain?
sentences.translation: 你在西班牙去了哪些城市？

sentences.sentence: A recent trip to London gave me the opportunity to visit the Science Museum.
sentences.translation: 最近的一次伦敦之行让我有机会参观了科学博物馆。

sentences.sentence: She doesn’t visit very often.
sentences.translation: 她不常来。

sentences.sentence: Have you seen any good films recently?
sentences.translation: 你最近看过什么好的影片吗？

sentences.sentence: Plan a weekend to go out with friends to barbecue countryside, see a film, play electronic games, play footaball or barly take a walk together.
sentences.translation: 安排个周末跟朋友一起，一起去野外烧烤、看电影、玩电子游戏、踢足球、或者只是一起走走。

sentences.sentence: You are calling your friend to see if he/she wants to go to see a film.
sentences.translation: 你打电话问你的朋友他/她是否想去看电影。

sentences.sentence: By the way, would you like to see a film with me tomorrow?A new film is on at the Capital Cinema.
sentences.translation: 顺便问一下，明天你愿不愿意和我一起去看电影? 首都电影院在上演一部新片。

phrases.translation: 公务旅行，出差；商务旅行
往返旅行；环程旅行；[牌]大团圆

sentences.sentence: Two lucky employees won a round-the-world trip.
sentences.translation: 两名幸运的雇员赢得一次环游世界的机会。

sentences.sentence: It’s an 80-mile round trip (= a journey to a place and back again ) to Exeter.
sentences.translation: 到埃克塞特往返有80英里。

sentences.sentence: I’m afraid you’ve had a wasted trip (= a trip in which you do not achieve your purpose ) . Mr Burgess has already left.
sentences.translation: 恐怕你是白来一趟了，伯吉斯先生已经走了。

sentences.sentence: He was unable to make the trip to accept the award.
sentences.translation: 他无法前去领奖。

sentences.sentence: Fred and Jeff are friends. They want to take a trip together.
sentences.translation: 国庆节快要来临了，弗雷德和杰夫是朋友，他们想一起去旅行。

sentences.sentence: Because of this, we often feel the need to take a trip somewhere to “get away from it all” as they also say.
sentences.translation: 为此，我们常常感到有必要去什么地方旅行来摆脱这种生活， 但是与其花大把的钱外出乱逛，为什么不稍作停歇？

sentences.sentence: His eyes roved round the supermarket.
sentences.translation: 他的眼睛环视了一下超级市场。

sentences.sentence: The whole supermarket was ruined in a great fire.
sentences.translation: 整个超级市场被一场大火烧掉。

sentences.sentence: The supermarket near our school will be reopened soon.
sentences.translation: 我们学校附近的那个超级市场不久将重新开业。

sentences.sentence: I do most of my studying in the evening.
sentences.translation: 我学习大都在晚上。

sentences.sentence: I’m usually out on Friday evenings.
sentences.translation: 周五晚上我通常都不在家。

sentences.sentence: What are you doing tomorrow evening?
sentences.translation: 明天晚上你打算做什么？

sentences.sentence: Peter left yesterday evening.
sentences.translation: 彼得昨天晚上走了。

sentences.sentence: I’ll see you this evening.
sentences.translation: 我今晚和你见面。

sentences.sentence: It was early evening by the time we got home.
sentences.translation: 我们到家时已经是傍晚了。

sentences.sentence: We had just finished our evening meal when the doorbell rang.
sentences.translation: 我们刚吃完晚饭门铃就响了。

sentences.sentence: a broadcast on the evening news
sentences.translation: 晚间新闻广播

sentences.sentence: I think I’ll go to bed early tonight.
sentences.translation: 我想今晚我会早点上床睡觉。

sentences.sentence: We’re meeting him at 9 o’clock tonight.
sentences.translation: 我们今晚9点和他见面。

sentences.sentence: Our class is going to London tomorrow.
sentences.translation: 我们班明天要去伦敦。

sentences.sentence: He will speak to us next week.
sentences.translation: 下星期他将给我们做讲演。

sentences.sentence: I reckon we'll go next week.
sentences.translation: 我想我们将在下星期去。

sentences.sentence: I have numerous engagements next week.
sentences.translation: 下星期我有许多约会。

sentences.sentence: Perhaps ‘lucky’ is not exactly the right word .
sentences.translation: 也许“幸运”一词还不够贴切。

sentences.sentence: Send them a post card.
sentences.translation: 寄给他们一张明信片。

sentences.sentence: Several years ago I received a post card from a friend in Jackson Hole, Wyo., who wrote, " I am skiing with abandon!"
sentences.translation: 几年前，我收到一个在怀俄明州杰克逊霍尔的朋友寄给我的明信片，上面写道：“我正在尽情的滑雪！”

sentences.sentence: My Christmas present is a post card. There is a lovely panda in it.
sentences.translation: 我的圣诞节礼物是一张明信片，上面有一只可爱的熊猫。

sentences.translation: 7点钟前只来了一半客人。

sentences.translation: 看看我们的会员，至少有一半是女性。

sentences.sentence: She balked at the price.
sentences.translation: 她对这价格犹豫不决。

sentences.translation: 他们就苹果的价格讨价还价。

sentences.sentence: Competition should beat the price down.
sentences.translation: 竞争一定会使价格下跌。

sentences.sentence: Thus informed, the people rose together on the designated day to overthrow the Yuan, and since that time mooncakes have become an integral part of the Mid-Autumn Festival.
sentences.translation: 后来，人们在八月十五那天集合起来推翻了元朝统治。 从那以后，月饼成为中秋节不可或缺的元素。

phrases.translation: 保持镇定（等于get it all together）；信息汇总

sentences.sentence: We’ve very much enjoyed working together .
sentences.translation: 我们在一起工作非常开心。

sentences.sentence: They’ve decided to spend more time together.
sentences.translation: 他们决定要花更多时间在一起。

sentences.sentence: He and my father were at school together.
sentences.translation: 他和我父亲一起上过学。

sentences.sentence: Together they went back inside the villa.
sentences.translation: 他们一起回到了别墅里。

sentences.sentence: A whole range of people from all backgrounds can get together and enjoy themselves.
sentences.translation: 出身经历各异的人们可以聚在一起玩得很开心。

sentences.sentence: Parents make mooncakes, moon masks, and lanterns with their children.
sentences.translation: 家长们与他们的孩子们一起制作月饼、月亮形面具和灯笼。

sentences.sentence: You need to touch up the poem.
sentences.translation: 你需要给这首诗润色一下。

sentences.sentence: The poem was all the rage then.
sentences.translation: 这首诗在当时十分流行。

sentences.sentence: His poem compares poorly with yours.
sentences.translation: 他的诗做得不如你的好。

sentences.translation: 他认为他已经解开了那个谜。

sentences.sentence: We’re going to do some hiking this summer.
sentences.translation: 今年夏天我们要去远足。

sentences.sentence: She: In my high school French class, there was a pen pal requirement.
sentences.translation: 她 ：在高中的法语课上，要求每个人交一名笔友。

sentences.sentence: You can also find a pen pal or an online community that will let you ask questions and talk to others who are learning French.
sentences.translation: 你也可以找个笔友，或是在网上找一个能让你问问题和与他人交流法语学习经验的论坛社区。

sentences.sentence: What are your hobbies?
sentences.translation: 你有些什么爱好？

sentences.sentence: Susan’s hobbies include reading, cooking, and drama.
sentences.translation: 苏珊的业余爱好包括阅读、烹饪和戏剧。

sentences.sentence: Retirement gave him the time to pursue his hobbies.
sentences.translation: 退休以后他有充裕的时间来做自己喜欢做的事。

phrases.translation: 固执的想法，固定的观念

sentences.sentence: You should talk to Ken – he's always full of good ideas.
sentences.translation: 你应该和肯谈谈，他总是满脑子好主意。

sentences.sentence: I knew it was a bad idea to leave him on his own.
sentences.translation: 我知道把他独自留下不是个好主意。

sentences.sentence: It was my wife’s idea to move house.
sentences.translation: 要搬家是我妻子的主意。

sentences.sentence: In Australia, climate change is a political football, kicked about in the power game played in Canberra.
sentences.translation: 在澳大利亚，气候变化是政治足球，在堪培拉的权力游戏中被踢来踢去。

sentences.sentence: Canberra needs the relationship - and the guarantees of military assistance that go with it - far more than Washington does.
sentences.translation: 堪培拉需要这种关系，以及随之而来的军援保证，远远超过华盛顿对这种关系的需要。

sentences.sentence: Kylie Catchpole, a research fellow at the Australian National University in Canberra, says the design is promising because it works over a broad band of the spectrum.
sentences.translation: 凯莉·卡崔布尔，堪培拉的澳洲国立大学的一名女研究员，说道这项设计很有前景因为研究的是宽频带的光谱。

sentences.sentence: We don’t have enough books so you’ll have to share.
sentences.translation: 我们书不够，所以你们得合着用。

sentences.sentence: The three of us shared a taxi.
sentences.translation: 我们三个人合乘一辆计程车。

sentences.translation: 工厂工人

sentences.translation: 旅游行业工作者

sentences.translation: 来自当地援助人员的报道

sentences.sentence: That postman is in charge of this route.
sentences.translation: 那个邮递员负责这条投递线路。

sentences.sentence: Curtis Matthews, a retired postman from North Carolina, was running the bar as a favour to his brother, who had left Louisiana after the attempt on his life the year before.
sentences.translation: 柯蒂斯·马修斯是一名来自南卡罗来纳的邮递员。 在因约翰·马修斯生命受到威胁而离开路易斯安那州以后，他就帮哥哥经营着酒店。

sentences.sentence: A businessman will grasp at any chance to make a profit.
sentences.translation: 一个商人会抓住任何一个机会赚钱。

sentences.sentence: His parents are so rich that he can just play at being a businessman.
sentences.translation: 他父母有的是钱，以致他可以敷衍了事地作个商人。

sentences.sentence: He is a businessman ... and that is what we need right now. Someone who can create jobs for our kids.
sentences.translation: 他是个商人，也就是我们现在最需要的人，他是一个可以为我们的孩子创造就业机会的人。

sentences.sentence: The police officer said your country [Pakistan] is not secure but I still prefer to live there. I love my country.
sentences.translation: 警官说你们巴基斯坦现在也不安全，但是我仍然希望回到祖国去生活，我爱我的祖国。

sentences.sentence: The laws specify, for example, that the police officer administering a photo or live lineup should not know who the suspect is, and the witness should be told that the officer does not know.
sentences.translation: 法律详细规定的有，如，警官在处理照片或一列待指认嫌疑人时不能先入为主地知道谁是嫌犯，而目击证人在指证时也应被告知，警察不知道谁是嫌犯。

sentences.sentence: The police officer led him to a beautiful garden with lots of grass, pretty flowers, and manicured hedges.
sentences.translation: 警官带着他到一个很美的花园，里面有很多的草，很多的花，修剪好的树坪。

sentences.sentence: In scorn of that audience, he imagines another audience, another audience to write for and to emulate, an audience represented by the fisherman.
sentences.translation: 讽刺这个观众，他想象着另一个观众，可以为之写作，做榜样的观众，渔夫代表了这个观众。

phrases.translation: 火箭专家；股市分析高手；[喻]行家

sentences.translation: 他是一位有声望的科学家。

sentences.translation: 作为一名科学家，他不信耶稣。

sentences.sentence: The scientist thirsts after an achievement.
sentences.translation: 这名科学家渴望取得成就。

sentences.translation: 战斗机驾驶员

sentences.sentence: The official report into the accident says that it was caused by pilot error (= a mistake by the pilot ) .
sentences.translation: 那宗事故的官方报告称事故是由飞行员失误造成的。

sentences.translation: 到国外旅行

sentences.sentence: The head teacher said pupils’, parents’ and other teachers’ opinions were sought before the uniform rules were changed.
sentences.translation: 校长说，在修改这一着装规定之前，已经征求过学生、家长和其他老师的意见。

sentences.sentence: Willie McEwen, acting head teacher at Westray Junior High, said: ''We're delighted that Loganair has come forward with this solution.
sentences.translation: 韦斯特雷中学代理校长威利·麦克尤恩说：“我们很高兴洛根航空公司能提出这个解决方案。”

sentences.sentence: In 1955, Meg took up a post as an English teacher at the French convent school and rose to become acting head teacher, despite her Protestant background.
sentences.translation: 父亲在那里的赫尔大学担任教育学院图书馆馆长。 1955年，母亲在法国修道院学校任英语教师，尽管她信奉新教，不久还是被升为代理校长。

phrases.translation: n. 红海（印度洋西北的长形内海，在亚洲阿拉伯半岛同非洲东北部之间）

sentences.sentence: Jay stripped his clothes off and ran into the sea.
sentences.translation: 杰伊脱光衣服奔入海里。

sentences.sentence: Most exports went by sea .
sentences.translation: 大部分出口商品都走海路。

sentences.translation: 一座海滨小屋

sentences.translation: 他在船上工作了30多年。

sentences.sentence: They stood side by side looking out to sea .

sentences.translation: 罗林斯今年将继续担任主席一职。

sentences.translation: 九名女性体重增加，四名仍保持不变。

sentences.translation: 他在那所大学教世界语。

sentences.translation: 她与来自另一大学的一名学生交朋友。

sentences.sentence: The student left the university to go out into the world and find himself.
sentences.translation: 这个学生离开了大学进入社会去发现自己的才能所在。

sentences.sentence: I go to the gym as often as I can.
sentences.translation: 我一有空就去健身房健身。

phrases.translation: 如果是这样的话；要是这样

sentences.sentence: We’ll stay at home if it rains.
sentences.translation: 如果下雨，我们就待在家里。

sentences.sentence: If you need money, I can lend you some.
sentences.translation: 如果你需要钱，我能借给你一些。

sentences.sentence: If I didn’t apologize, I’d feel guilty.
sentences.translation: 如果我不道歉，我会感到内疚。

sentences.sentence: If you had worked harder, you would have passed your exams.
sentences.translation: 要是你再努力一点，就通过考试了。

sentences.sentence: What would happen to your family if you were to die in an accident?
sentences.translation: 要是你在意外事故中身亡，你的家人会怎么样呢？

sentences.sentence: If Dad were here, he would know what to do.
sentences.translation: 如果爸爸在这儿，他会知道怎么做的。

sentences.sentence: Taste the soup and add salt and pepper if necessary.
sentences.translation: 尝一下汤，需要的话加一点盐和胡椒粉。

sentences.sentence: I want to get back by five o’clock if possible.
sentences.translation: 如果可能的话，我想5点之前回来。

sentences.sentence: I think I can fix it tomorrow. If not, you’ll have to wait till Friday.
sentences.translation: 我想明天我能修好它，如果不行，你只好等到周五了。

sentences.sentence: Is the book available, and if so, where?
sentences.translation: 有没有这本书？ 如果有的话，在哪儿？

sentences.sentence: The missiles can be fired only if the operator types in a six-digit code.
sentences.translation: 只有在操作员输入一组六位数密码后，导弹才能发射。

sentences.sentence: We’ll face that problem if and when it comes along (= if it happens or when it happens ).
sentences.translation: 如果这一问题真的发生了，我们就要面对它。

sentences.sentence: If by any chance you can’t manage dinner tonight, perhaps we can at least have a drink together.
sentences.translation: 万一你今晚不能来吃饭，或许我们至少可以一起喝一杯。

sentences.sentence: a news reporter
sentences.translation: 新闻记者

phrases.translation: 土地利用，土地用途；土地使用，土壤使用
应要求；供…使用的；为…供应
实际用途；实际应用；实用

sentences.sentence: Can I use your phone?
sentences.translation: 我可以用一下你的电话吗？

sentences.sentence: I’ll show you which room you can use.
sentences.translation: 我来跟你说一下你可以用哪个房间。

sentences.sentence: I always use the same shampoo.
sentences.translation: 我一直用同一种洗发水。

sentences.sentence: Use your imagination when planning meals.
sentences.translation: 安排三餐时要动点脑筋。

sentences.sentence: She booked the flight using a false name.
sentences.translation: 她用化名预订了航班。

phrases.translation: 特种；特殊型；特殊型号的设备

sentences.sentence: italic type
sentences.translation: 斜体字

sentences.sentence: We need to get this finished as quickly as possible.
sentences.translation: 我们必须尽快完成此事。

sentences.sentence: Kids grow up so quickly these days.
sentences.translation: 现在的孩子长得真快啊。

phrases.translation: n. （美）国务卿；（英）国务大臣；（美）州政府秘书长
布政司；主任秘书；书记官长
执行秘书；行政秘书；总经理秘书

sentences.sentence: My secretary will fax you all the details.
sentences.translation: 我的秘书会把所有的细节发传真给你。

sentences.sentence: I was angry because he hadn’t told me his plans.
sentences.translation: 我很生气，因为他没有告诉我他的计划。

sentences.sentence: He was beginning to get angry .
sentences.translation: 他开始发脾气了。

sentences.sentence: His comments brought an angry response from opposition politicians.
sentences.translation: 他的话激起反对派政客愤怒的回应。

sentences.sentence: ‘Calm down,’ she said, looking at his angry face.
sentences.translation: “冷静一下。”她看着他那张生气的脸说道。

sentences.sentence: Jesse laughed, which made me even angrier .
sentences.translation: 杰西笑了起来，这令我更加恼火。

sentences.sentence: There’s no need to be afraid.
sentences.translation: 没有必要害怕。

phrases.translation: [古语]十分严肃地，一本正经地

sentences.sentence: She gave me a worried look.
sentences.translation: 她担心地看了我一眼。

sentences.sentence: His parents must be worried sick (= extremely worried ) .
sentences.translation: 他的父母肯定担心死了。

phrases.translation: 生日快乐；祝你生日快乐
与…在一起很高兴；对…感到满意
快乐的节日；愉快的假期
欢乐谷（游乐场）；跑马地（香港一高级住宅区）
n. 快乐时间；减价供应饮料等的时间（酒吧间术语）

sentences.sentence: It’s a lovely house and we’ve been very happy here.
sentences.translation: 房子很漂亮，我们住在这里非常开心。

sentences.sentence: I’ve never felt happier in my life.
sentences.translation: 我一生从未感到如此快乐。

sentences.sentence: He was a happy child who rarely cried.
sentences.translation: 他是一个快乐的孩子，很少哭鼻子。

sentences.sentence: the happy faces of the children
sentences.translation: 孩子们快乐的表情

sentences.sentence: I loved her and thought I could make her happy.
sentences.translation: 我爱她，我想我能让她幸福快乐。

sentences.sentence: You're hacking these days, you should go to see a doctor.
sentences.translation: 这几天你总是干咳，你得找医生看一看啦。

sentences.sentence: If you notice a bad smell or think you may have an infection, see a doctor or gynecologist right away.
sentences.translation: 如果你发现了身上有难闻的气味，或者你认为自己得了传染病，马上去看医生、或者妇科医生。

sentences.sentence: But if your symptoms persist—or worsen dramatically—see a doctor!
sentences.translation: 但是如果你的症状一直持续——或急剧恶化——去看医生吧！

phrases.translation: 磨损，耗尽；穿破；使精疲力竭
磨损试验；磨耗试验；试穿

sentences.sentence: Susanna was wearing a black silk dress.
sentences.translation: 苏珊娜穿着一条黑色真丝连衣裙。

sentences.sentence: He wore glasses for reading.
sentences.translation: 他阅读时戴眼镜。

phrases.translation: 更多信息；详细信息；更多资料
需要更多信息；取得进一步资讯

sentences.sentence: More and more people are surviving heart attacks.
sentences.translation: 越来越多的人在心脏病发作后存活下来。

sentences.sentence: He spent more time perfecting his dance moves instead of gym work.
sentences.translation: 他用更多的时间来完善他的舞蹈动作而不是健身。

phrases.translation: —深陷其中，深深卷入(尤指麻烦)
深陷(于)，专心致力(于)，埋头(于)；沉湎于…中，全神贯注的
深海；深海的；深深的海洋
深度睡眠；睡眠的深层状态

sentences.sentence: a deep wound
sentences.translation: 很深的伤口

sentences.sentence: She was sitting in a deep leather chair.
sentences.translation: 她坐在一张很深的皮椅子里。

phrases.translation: 喘不过气来，上气不接下气
使大吃一惊；使人高兴得说不出话来；令人屏息
喘口气；深深地吸一口气
使大吃一惊；让我无法呼吸
别唠叨了；省口气吧；别白费口舌了
一口气；同时（等于in the same breath）
(因恐惧、焦虑而)屏息地，不出声地[见 breath]
呼吸十分困难， 上气不接下气

sentences.sentence: Slow down, I need to catch my breath.
sentences.translation: 慢一点，我要喘口气。

sentences.sentence: I did just have to take a deep breath and push the publish button regardless of the fear.
sentences.translation: 我实在只需要深呼吸一口，然后不管什么恐惧，点一下发布按钮就好了。

sentences.sentence: Get it out of your system. Then take a deep breath and consider how evolution affected a few specific body parts, and why.
sentences.translation: 把它从你的思绪中去掉然后深呼吸，现在来考虑进化是如何影响一些特殊的身体器官以及为什么。

sentences.sentence: Instead, take the time to go outside and really observe nature, take a deep breath of fresh air, enjoy the serenity of water and greenery.
sentences.translation: 实际上，我们应该抽出时间到户外走走，观赏自然美景，深深呼吸新鲜空气，享受泉水和草木的宁静。

phrases.translation: [口]人口调查；总人数；民意测验

sentences.sentence: I was amazed at the number of plants - I counted 147.
sentences.translation: 我对植物的数量之多感到惊讶，我数了有147棵。

sentences.sentence: Before you blow up and say something you'll regret later - count to ten.
sentences.translation: 在你自我膨胀并说出一些会后悔的话之前——先数到十吧。

sentences.sentence: Just count to ten and then consider whether or not you should make that purchase.
sentences.translation: 数到十然后再考虑一下你是否购买。

phrases.translation: 开门见山；提到关键问题；转入（或切入）正题
徒劳的搜索；劳而无功的事

sentences.sentence: The dogs saw him running and chased him.
sentences.translation: 那些狗看到他在跑就追他。

sentences.sentence: kids chasing around the house
sentences.translation: 在屋里追逐嬉戏的孩子们

phrases.translation: 猫戏老鼠；恣意玩弄折磨（像猫对老鼠般）
n. [医]裸鼠；裸小鼠；无毛鼠（指实验室中饲养的老鼠）

sentences.sentence: Cats prey on birds and mice.
sentences.translation: 猫捕食鸟类及老鼠。

sentences.sentence: We disinfested the kitchen of mice.
sentences.translation: 我们杀灭了厨房的老鼠。

sentences.sentence: We'll have to dispose of the mice in the house .
sentences.translation: 我们得消灭屋里的老鼠。

phrases.translation: n. 坏消息；令人讨厌的人；倒霉的事
心情不好；处在不好的情绪中

sentences.sentence: The bad weather conditions prevented the plane from landing.
sentences.translation: 恶劣的天气使飞机无法着陆。

sentences.sentence: Divorce is bad for children.
sentences.translation: 离婚对孩子不好。

sentences.sentence: Was anyone hurt in the accident?
sentences.translation: 事故中有人受伤吗？

sentences.sentence: Put that thing down - you might hurt someone with it.
sentences.translation: 快把那东西放下，你会伤着别人的。

phrases.translation: 难受；感到不适；感觉病了
非法得到的钱财；不义之财
不安的，担心的；不舒服的
不畅快；局促不安；心神不宁

sentences.sentence: Bridget can’t come – she’s ill.
sentences.translation: 布里奇特不能来了，她生病了。

sentences.sentence: I was feeling ill that day and decided to stay at home.
sentences.translation: 我那天不太舒服，决定留在家里。

sentences.sentence: a hospice for the terminally ill
sentences.translation: 晚期病人的安养院

sentences.sentence: Is anything wrong? You haven’t said more than two words since you got here.
sentences.translation: 出什么事啦？你到这儿以后还没说超过两句话呢。

sentences.sentence: Dave’s got something wrong with his foot.
sentences.translation: 戴夫的一只脚出了点毛病。

sentences.sentence: Don’t worry, there’s nothing wrong .
sentences.translation: 别担心，没问题的。

phrases.translation: 我该怎么办；我应该做些什么

sentences.sentence: What should I do? Should I trust him?
sentences.translation: 我该怎么办？我应该相信他吗？

sentences.sentence: You should read his new book.
sentences.translation: 你应该读一读他的新书。

sentences.sentence: I should stay in bed if I were you .
sentences.translation: 我要是你，就卧床休息。

phrases.translation: 镇定；感觉很好；觉得身体正常
是什么滋味；是什么感觉；意味着什么
在家中般轻松自在；感觉自在

sentences.sentence: Do you still feel hungry?
sentences.translation: 你还觉得饿吗？

sentences.sentence: You can never tell what he’s feeling.
sentences.translation: 他的感受你永远说不准。

sentences.sentence: Stop exercising if you feel any pain.
sentences.translation: 要是感到疼痛就停止练习。

sentences.sentence: I felt like I’d really achieved something.
sentences.translation: 我感觉自己真的有所成就了。

phrases.translation: 很好；很健康；还可以；还好

sentences.sentence: He had the operation yesterday, and he’s doing very well.
sentences.translation: 他昨天做了手术，恢复得很好。

phrases.translation: 开庭审理；成为…的一员；旁听；列席
处于极有利的位置；过着舒服的生活
稳坐不动；坚持主张；静待事态的发展
坐在户外；袖手旁观；耐着性子看完或听完
v. 一直挺到结束；耐着性子看完
坐过去一点；[桥]坐在…的上手

sentences.sentence: The parliament building sits in a large square.
sentences.translation: 议会大楼位于一个大广场上。

sentences.sentence: He’s got a computer sitting on his desk, but he doesn’t use it.
sentences.translation: 他有一台电脑放在书桌上，但他不用。

sentences.sentence: My climbing boots were sitting unused in a cupboard.
sentences.translation: 我的登山靴在橱柜里，一直没有穿。

sentences.sentence: The house has sat empty for two years.
sentences.translation: 这幢房子已经空置两年了。

phrases.translation: ◎(牲畜)被放牧在草场上，放牧，放草

sentences.sentence: I walked across the grass.
sentences.translation: 我走在草地上。

sentences.sentence: Keep off the grass.
sentences.translation: 请勿践踏草地。

sentences.sentence: In the dry season, it could be attacked by another species of ant.
sentences.translation: 在干燥的季节里,它可能会遭到另一个种类的蚂蚁攻击。

sentences.sentence: He later learned that another entomologist in New Jersey, 260 miles away, observed a wedding flight by the same species of ant, on the same day, and at exactly the same time!
sentences.translation: 他后来知道，在260英里以外纽泽西州另一个昆虫学家也观察到同一种类蚂蚁举行飞行婚礼的时间，竟和他记录的在同一天、同一个时刻！

sentences.sentence: You’ve really got no need to worry about your weight.
sentences.translation: 你真的不必担心你的体重。

sentences.sentence: Don’t tell Mum about this – she’s got enough to worry about (= she already has a lot of problems or is very busy ) .
sentences.translation: 别把这件事告诉妈妈——她已经够操心的了。

phrases.translation: 被迫接受；无法摆脱；肩负

sentences.sentence: Sara tried to open the window but it was stuck.
sentences.translation: 萨拉想打开窗户，但窗户卡住了。

sentences.sentence: They got stuck in a traffic jam.
sentences.translation: 他们遇到了交通堵塞。

phrases.translation: 泥浆循环系统；泥浆系统

sentences.sentence: By the end of the game, all the kids were covered in mud.
sentences.translation: 到了比赛快结束的时候，所有的孩子都浑身是泥。

sentences.sentence: The path beside the river was slippery with mud.
sentences.translation: 河边的小路泥泞湿滑。

sentences.sentence: Many villages in Mali consist of mud huts.
sentences.translation: 马里的大多数村庄都是泥草房。

sentences.sentence: boots caked with mud
sentences.translation: 沾满泥巴的靴子

sentences.sentence: It was impossible to move the car – its wheels had got stuck in the mud.
sentences.translation: 这车子动不了——车轮陷到烂泥里了。

phrases.translation: 离开，撤离；拔出；渡过难关；恢复健康；折叠的大张插页；飞机进场重新飞起
摧毁，推翻；拉下来；使……下跌
拉回；撤回；拉为平手；反悔
把…开到路边；开到路边；靠岸

sentences.sentence: Mom! Davey’s pulling my hair!
sentences.translation: 妈妈! 戴维拽我的头发！

sentences.sentence: If everyone is ready, I’ll begin.
sentences.translation: 如果大家都准备好了，我就开始。

sentences.sentence: Send my best wishes to everyone in the family.
sentences.translation: 请向全家人致以最美好的祝愿。

sentences.sentence: Of course everyone else thought it was hilarious!
sentences.translation: 当然其他所有人都觉得好笑极了！

sentences.sentence: Not everyone enjoys sport.
sentences.translation: 并不是谁都喜欢体育运动的。
